articles.description: Aprilia is all set to launch their upcoming supersport at India Bike Week 2023 and it will rival the KTM RC 390, the Yamaha R3 and Kawasaki Ninja 400
articles.content: Aprilia had teased their upcoming supersport, the Aprilia RS457, on social media with the caption “…RS 457 will make a grand stop, with an announcement worthy of India Bike Week’s 10th anniversary.” … [+1851 chars]

articles.author: Kunal Manchanda & Harsh Upadhyay
articles.title: BookMyShow posts Rs 1,026 Cr income and Rs 85 Cr profit in FY23 - Entrackr
articles.description: BookMyShow’s revenue surged 3.5X to Rs 976 Cr in FY23 from Rs 277 Cr in FY22, its financial statements sourced from the ROC shows.

articles.author: Ashwani Mahajan
articles.title: Robust GDP growth brightens India’s chances to surpass Germany by 2026 - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The largest share of growth in value addition was from manufacturing, which grew by 13.9 percent. Growth in manufacturing indicates the success of the Union government's Atmanirbhar Bharat policy. A large number of new production units are coming up in every …
articles.content: Data released by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation show India's GDP at constant prices, grew at the rate of 7.6 percent annually, during the second quarter of the year 2023-24, … [+5411 chars]

articles.title: BCL Industries to supply ethanol worth Rs 516 cr to OMCs, shares jump 11.5% - Moneycontrol
articles.description: BCL Industries was selected for supply of 8.20 lakh liters of ethanol to OMCs
articles.content:
BCL Industries stock jumped 11.5 percent as the firm has been selected to supply ethanol worth Rs 561 crore to OMCs.
The firm, along with its subsidiary, Svaksha Distillery, participated in a tender… [+1625 chars]
